name: dfs.client.short.circuit.num
description:
Number of short-circuit caches. This setting should
    be in the range 1 - 5. Lower values will result in lower CPU consumption; higher
    values may speed up massive parallel reading files.

name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries.on.timeouts
description:
Indicates the number of retries a client will make on socket timeout
               to establish a server connection.

name: mapreduce.task.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor
  updates its status string.  A value of 0 disables the timeout.

name: dfs.balancer.service.retries.on.exception
description:
When the balancer is executed as a long-running service, it will retry upon encountering an exception. This
    configuration determines how many times it will retry before considering the exception to be fatal and quitting.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there are tasks speculated in this round.

name: dfs.namenode.service.handler.count
description:
The number of Namenode RPC server threads that listen to
  requests from DataNodes and from all other non-client nodes.
  dfs.namenode.service.handler.count will be valid only if
  dfs.namenode.servicerpc-address is configured.

name: dfs.mover.moverThreads
description: Configure the balancer's mover thread pool size.
